name: Zombie Town
description: Well the world finally ended. Zombies rule the planet. Your plan to survive alone hasn't been going so well. Desperate, you use an old radio to ask for help. How about that? Somebody is answering your call!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Visa / 7 Processor: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
